title: TIE Prototype
wikitext:
[[File:TIE-Prototype.jpg|thumb|500px]] '''TIE Prototype'''
'''Craft''': Sienar Fleet Systems TIE/Prototype
'''Affiliation''': Empire
'''Era''': Rise of the Empire
'''Source''': The Starship Challenge ( a Wizards of the coast D6 product web entchantment for creating D20 data on a D6 base )
'''Type''': Space superiority starfighter
'''Scale''': Starfighter
'''Length''': 6.3 meters
'''Skill''': Starfighter piloting: (TIE)
'''Crew''': 1
'''Crew Skill''': Starfighter piloting 4D+1, starship gunnery 4D
'''Cargo Capacity''': 65 kilograms; 25 cubic centimeters
'''Consumables''': 1 day
'''Cost''': 60,000 (new), 25,000 (used)
'''Maneuverability''': 2D
'''Space''': 10
'''Atmosphere''': 415; 1,200 kmh
'''Hull''': 2D
'''Sensors''': *Passive: 20/0D *Scan: 40/1D *Search: 60/2D *Focus: 3/3D '''Weapons''': *2 light Laser Cannons (fire linked) : Fire Arc: Front
Skill: Starship gunnery
Fire Control: 1D
Space Range: 1-3/12/25
Atmosphere Range: 100-300/1.2/2.5 km
Damage: 4D *Small Proton Torpedo Launcher : Fire Arc: Front
Skill: Starship gunnery
Fire Control: 2D
Space Range: 1/3/7
Atmosphere Range: 100/300/700meters
Damage: 9D *Design is built to have the ability to attack enemy capital ships with weapons that cause more damage as a laser canon would do. *Prototype was designed on the Idea to improve the existing starfighters after field trials, with field results, they get into the action block, or gather dust in storage.
